name: @scullyio/init
description: Add scully to your angular app

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "add new version build"
scripts.publish:patch: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version patch && npm run commit && npm publish && npm run push --access public
scripts.publish:minor: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version minor && npm run commit && npm publish && npm run push --access public
scripts.publish:major: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm version major && npm run commit && npm publish && npm run push --access public

author: @herodevs
